title: A Place in the Sun - David Hamilton (Photography Art Ebook).pdf
description:
A Place in the Sun By David Hamilton
Publisher: Aurum Press Ltd 1996 | 94 Pages | ISBN: 1854104314 | PDF | 8.7 MB

If you take some of the pictures away from the context of the entirety of his work, then pornography they can be. But I was quite astonished as I flicked through the volume to find that the feeling aroused inside me wasn't what I expected, sensual but not sexual. The images capture a quality not seen in our society. A certain fundamental and naked truth about the subjects, and I'm not just talking about the female model, but the landscape, flowers... also. Some people call this naivity, innocence (I don't think those models are very innocent somehow), but to me a somewhat simplistic, inert and senual quality that modern society chooses to ignore. Pornography, erotic art? You be your own judge.
